last_episode_to_air.name: Hero of the Year
last_episode_to_air.overview: Wes Weasley has sold out to Robotnik, and lures Tails, Sonic and all of their friends to a yacht under the guise of a "Hero of the Year" ceremony to thank Sonic.

name: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
overview: Follow the adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog, and his sidekick Tails, as they attempt to stop Dr. Robotnik and his array of robots from taking over the planet Mobius.

episodes.name: Best Hedgehog
episodes.overview: Sonic and Tails rescue Lucas from Robotnik's clutches in hopes of reuniting him with his girlfriend, Lucinda, with whom Robotnik is also in love.

episodes.name: Tails' New Home
episodes.overview: Robotnik creates a robot fox family when he finds out that Sonic is trying to find Tails a new home to keep him safe.

episodes.name: Birth of a Salesman
episodes.overview: Robotnik buys new gadgets from an enterprising salesman to help Scratch and Grounder catch Sonic, but winds up regretting his purchases when they keep backfiring.

episodes.name: Submerged Sonic
episodes.overview: Robotnik is after the Power Gems from the city of Submerbia and Sonic and Tails are hired to stop him.

episodes.name: Pseudo Sonic
episodes.overview: Robotnik creates a robot Sonic suit in order to ruin his reputation.

episodes.name: Over the Hill Hero
episodes.overview: Robotnik fools Captain Rescue into capturing Sonic after the aging superhero lets his guard down, so Tails must convince Rescue to be his old self again in order to save Sonic.

episodes.name: Robolympics
episodes.overview:
An asteroid is heading for Turtle Town and Robotnik offers to save it, but only if Sonic agrees to play in the Robolympics against him and his robots.

Sonic Says segment: Being active

episodes.name: Lovesick Sonic
episodes.overview:
When Sonic saves a female hedgehog named Breezie, he falls in love. Sonic does not know that Breezie is a robot that Dr. Robotnik created to keep Sonic occupied while he floods a village near his fortress.

Sonic Says segment: Sexual harassment

episodes.name: Subterranean Sonic
episodes.overview:
Sonic and Tails escape underground from Scratch and Grounder, but they are held captive there by a miserly mole named Spelunk.

Sonic Says segment: Sharing

episodes.name: Grounder the Genius
episodes.overview:
Grounder accidentally puts a "genius chip" in his head and it makes him so smart that he easily captures Sonic and even takes over Robotnik's operations.

Sonic Says segment: Using your brain

episodes.name: High Stakes Sonic
episodes.overview:
Sonic and Tails infiltrate Robotnik's new Casino Night Zone to stop him and his henchmen from scamming a group of sheep into becoming Robotnik's slaves.

Sonic Says segment: Dares

episodes.name: Blank-Headed Eagle
episodes.overview:
Scratch suffers a blow to the head and believes that he is his favorite television character, Edgar Eagle. Sonic uses this to his advantage in preventing another one of Robotnik's schemes.

Sonic Says segment: Seat belt safety

episodes.name: Boogey-Mania
episodes.overview:
Robotnik reprograms a machine created by Von Schlemmer capable of bringing dreams into reality and unleashes a dream monster upon Mobius.

Sonic Says segment: Sleep

episodes.name: Big Daddy
episodes.overview: Sonic tries to save a gorilla that is under Robotnik's control, while Coconuts finds the gorilla's lost baby and plots to use it against Sonic.

episodes.name: The Robotnik Express
episodes.overview:
On the way to stop a train of explosives from arriving at Robotnik's munition factory, Sonic and Tails must deal with a duo of bears named Big Griz and Mad Mike after Scratch and Grounder tell them that Sonic and Tails are the enemies.

Sonic Says segment: Strangers

episodes.name: Mama Robotnik's Birthday
episodes.overview:
Robotnik's obnoxious mother visits her son on her birthday and expects a present. After he fails to destroy a nearby forest as a present, however, she decides to capture Sonic as her own gift.

Sonic Says segment: Trees

episodes.name: Slowwww Going
episodes.overview:
Sonic must save a family of sloths from Dr. Robotnik's slow-motion ray. But when he himself is slowed down by Scratch and Grounder, Tails and the sloth family must take action.

Sonic Says segment: Sloths

episodes.name: So Long Sucker
episodes.overview:
Tails adopts a squishy creature from another dimension named Goobster, who turns out to be a black hole.

Sonic Says segment: Pets

episodes.name: Robotnik's Rival
episodes.overview:
Robotnik and a rival named Brandon Quark try to cooperate in capturing Sonic. However, Sonic tricks them into becoming enemies, and they try to outdo each other.

Sonic Says segment: Cheating

episodes.name: Trail of the Missing Tails
episodes.overview: Robotnik's insane cousin, Dr. Warpnik, captures Tails and lures Sonic into his Zone of Confusion in order to enact revenge on Robotnik for banishing him.

episodes.name: Momma Robotnik Returns
episodes.overview: Momma Robotnik visits her son, and after he fails once again, she disowns him and decides to adopt Sonic as her own son in order to capture him.

episodes.name: Too Tall Tails
episodes.overview: Tails gets a megadose of Robotnik's growth gas and grows quickly to monstrous proportions, eating everything in sight and terrorizing the countryside.

episodes.name: Super Special Sonic Search & Smash Squad
episodes.overview: When Sonic and Tails are captured by Scratch and Grounder, Sonic creates a diversion by telling the duo the story of their creation.

episodes.name: Magnificent Sonic
episodes.overview: Sonic becomes the sheriff of Tranquil Gulch, in hopes of keeping Robotnik's robots from harassing the locals.

episodes.name: Zoobotnik
episodes.overview: An intergalactic huntress visits Mobius, capturing various citizens and falling in love with Robotnik.

episodes.name: Tails in Charge
episodes.overview: When Scratch and Grounder use Robotnik's latest invention to turn Sonic to stone, Tails attempts to foil the duo to ensure Sonic's safety.

episodes.name: Musta Been a Beautiful Baby
episodes.overview: Robotnik's attempt to cause Sonic to age rapidly with his newest device backfires, turning him and Tails, and later himself, into babies.

episodes.name: Sonic the Matchmaker
episodes.overview: Robotnik pursues Breezie and Robotnik Jr. in order to find out why they betrayed him with the intent of building a perpetually loyal robot wife.

episodes.name: Attack on Pinball Fortress
episodes.overview: Robotnik has unleashed his Stupidity Ray on Mobius, knowing that the newly-stupefied Mobians will be too brain dead to stop him.

episodes.name: The Last Resort
episodes.overview: Robotnik seemingly announces his surrender to Sonic, and he invites him to a resort in his gratitude.

episodes.name: Coachnik
episodes.overview: Robotnik constructs a pushy robot coach in an attempt to increase Scratch and Grounder's fitness.

episodes.name: Sonic Gets Thrashed
episodes.overview: When Robotnik opens up a resort to make resident Mobians his slaves, Sonic enlists the help of some robots from an area of Mobius called Scrap Valley.

episodes.name: Close Encounter of the Sonic Kind
episodes.overview: Sonic and Tails help an alien prince fix his space shuttle so he can return to his home planet for his coronation before his younger brother is crowned in his place and has Mobius destroyed.

episodes.name: Tails Prevails
episodes.overview: On Sonic's birthday, Tails builds a flying bicycle. Realizing Tails' potential with mechanics, Professor Von Schlemmer invites Tails to be his research assistant.

episodes.name: Robotnik, Jr.
episodes.overview: Robotnik constructs a robot son in order to help him with his conquest of Mobius.

episodes.name: The Magic Hassle
episodes.overview: Coconuts acquires a magic wand and magical gadgets from Wes Weasley, and attempts to master them.

episodes.name: Blackbot the Pirate
episodes.overview: Robotnik goes time-traveling to find the four Chaos Emeralds that bestow the user unlimited power. His first stop is the time of Blackbeard the Pirate, where he enlists the pirate's help to find the first emerald.

episodes.name: Hedgehog of the "Hound" Table
episodes.overview: Robotnik's next stop in his time-travel is the Middle Ages, where the second emerald is. Sonic follows him, but Robotnik, with the unwilling help of a local wizard, obtains the emerald and takes over the kingdom.

episodes.name: Robotnik's Pyramid Scheme
episodes.overview: In his next time-travel stop, Robotnik plans on erasing Sonic's family tree in order to get the third emerald.

episodes.name: Prehistoric Sonic
episodes.overview: Despite the intervention of Sonic and Tails, Robotnik obtains the fourth and final emerald in prehistory. With the emeralds gathered together, Robotnik uses them to become an all-powerful being.

episodes.name: Untouchable Sonic
episodes.overview: Sonic comes to the rescue of a town that is held for ransom by Robotnik's crime syndicate.

episodes.name: Sonic Breakout
episodes.overview: Robotnik imprisons a satirical cartoonist for making fun of him in his comic book, much to the chagrin of his biggest fan, Sonic.

episodes.name: Sonically Ever After
episodes.overview: Scratch and Grounder use a ray gun Robotnik invented to transport Sonic, Tails, and Robotnik into a book of fairy tales.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Missing Hi-tops
episodes.overview: During a fair in his honor, Sonic's shoes are stolen and he and Tails use detective intellect to find the thief.

episodes.name: Super Robotnik
episodes.overview: A chemical accident caused by Coconuts ends up giving superpowers to Robotnik, who quickly uses them to threaten Mobius's world leaders and publicly humiliate Sonic.

episodes.name: Mass Transit Trouble
episodes.overview: Robotnik threatens to demolish an airport, a lighthouse, and a train station. Sonic is forced to travel to all three places in order to remove the bombs.

episodes.name: Spaceman Sonic
episodes.overview: Robotnik sends Scratch and Grounder into space to pillage the asteroid belt, with Sonic and Tails in pursuit.

episodes.name: MacHopper
episodes.overview: Robotnik attempts to brainwash MacHopper, a friend of Sonic's into doing his dirty deeds, but an explosion causes his memory to become unstable.

episodes.name: Baby-Sitter Jitters
episodes.overview: Sonic and Tails babysit a trio of unruly baby beavers who end up being abducted by Scratch and Grounder.

episodes.name: Full Tilt Tails
episodes.overview: Robotnik makes chewing gum that makes the consumer as fast as Sonic.

episodes.name: Lifestyles of the Sick and Twisted
episodes.overview: When Throbbin Screech features Sonic on his talk show, Lifestyles of the Very Good, Robotnik kidnaps his niece in order to be featured on the show.

episodes.name: Road Hog
episodes.overview: Sonic and Tails get arrested for speeding due to Robotnik's nefarious hypnotizing scheme.

episodes.name: The Mobius 5000
episodes.overview: Sonic and Tails enter a car race in order to save an orphanage that Robotnik threatens to shut down.

episodes.name: Honey, I Shrunk the Hedgehog
episodes.overview: Sonic, Tails and a group of mole miners are hit by Robotnik's shrink ray and must work together to reverse the effects.

episodes.name: Sonic's Song
episodes.overview: Outraged by a popular song about Sonic, Robotnik outlaws music on Mobius and takes the song's composer captive with the intent of creating his own song.

episodes.name: Sno Problem
episodes.overview: Robotnik plans to freeze all of the Mobians in order to make them obedient.

episodes.name: Sonic Is Running
episodes.overview: When Momma Robotnik threatens her son into campaigning for the Mobius presidency, Sonic decides to run against him.

episodes.name: Mad Mike, Da Bear Warrior
episodes.overview: Robotnik forces a starving village of rabbits into building a statue of himself.

episodes.name: Robotnikland
episodes.overview: Robotnik takes control of the local amusement park on Sonic's birthday and uses it to try to finish him off.

episodes.name: The Little Merhog
episodes.overview: Sonic and Tails help a mermaid hedgehog named Merna save her underwater city from the wrath of Captain John Paul Memo.

episodes.name: Robo-Ninjas
episodes.overview: Robotnik captures Kwai Chang Crane, a martial arts master, and uses him to turn Scratch and Grounder into effective ninja to defeat Sonic.

episodes.name: Fast and Easy
episodes.overview: A pickpocket named Easy Eddie picks at Robotnik's Chaos Emerald ring, much to his anger. Sonic must keep Easy Eddie hidden so that he can discard the ring.

episodes.name: Tails' Tale
episodes.overview: When Sonic mysteriously vanishes, Tails, Professor Von Schlemmer, and a pilot named William le Due search for him in the Pyramid of Kommamachs.

episodes.name: The Robots' Robot
episodes.overview: Scratch and Grounder build a robot of their own who soon runs away and ends up befriending Sonic.

episodes.name: Hero of the Year
episodes.overview: Wes Weasley has sold out to Robotnik, and lures Tails, Sonic and all of their friends to a yacht under the guise of a "Hero of the Year" ceremony to thank Sonic.
